observer effects the observed this
statement is well known in modern
physics it refers to how a person can

what resulted from the double slit

in quantum physics this speaks to how

not known it responds in waves the
question is whether the photon is going

unfortunately no one has been able to

pattern disappears the detector is not
physically influencing the experiment at
all the same firing of electrons and
photons through the two slits is made
but with the detector the response is
different the only explanation is the
so-called observer effect when the
process is being observed it changes the
outcome even though it is not directly
affecting the process this has been
expanded to popular culture and that it
shows that just by observing something
you can change the results many people
